org.theospi.portfolio.security.app

Interface ApplicationAuthorizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MatrixAuthorizer, PresentationAuthorizerImpl, StyleAuthorizerImpl, WizardAuthorizerImpl, WorksiteAuthorizer

    public interface ApplicationAuthorizer
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: John Ellis Date: May 19, 2004 Time: 4:26:17 PM To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List getFunctions()
      This method is how the authorizer registers interest in a particular function.
      Boolean isAuthorized(AuthorizationFacade facade, Agent agent, String function, Id id)
      This method will ask the application specific functional authorizer to determine authorization.

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthorized

        Boolean isAuthorized(AuthorizationFacade facade,
                   Agent agent,
                   String function,
                   Id id)
        This method will ask the application specific functional authorizer to determine authorization.
        Parameters:
        facade - this can be used to do explicit auths if necessary
        agent -
        function -
        id -
        Returns:
        null if the authorizer has no opinion, true if authorized, false if explicitly not authorized.

      • getFunctions

        List getFunctions()
        This method is how the authorizer registers interest in a particular function. An ApplicationAuthorizer will only be consulted if the function appears in this list.
        Returns:
        a List of functions that this authorizer cares about
